hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="r-base" published_version="3.4.3"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi ########################
sudo zypper update -y
cat /etc/os-release sudo zypper install -y wget tar rpm-build help2man zlib-devel xz-devel ncurses-devel make cairo-devel gcc-c++ gcc-fortran libcurl-devel libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libtiff-devel readline-devel fdupes texlive-helvetic texlive-metafont texlive-psnfss texlive-times xdg-utils pango-devel tcl-devel tk-devel xorg-x11-devel perl-macros texinfo java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk java -version
wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-3/R-3.4.3.tar.gz tar zxvf R-3.4.3.tar.gz
cd R-3.4.3
./configure --with-x=no make sudo make install export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH export LANG="en_US.UTF-8" make check
echo "sessionInfo()" | R --save
